message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a decent chunk too
That's a bit too lopsided, Bob. I'd like to see a more even split.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I still think this is a fairer split.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, but I'm still willing to give you a decent chunk
No way, Bob! That's way too skewed in your favor. I'm not giving up that much.
I'm not afraid to take a bit more, Bob. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I'm not going to back down, Alice. I'm taking the majority
No way, Bob! That's an outrageously bad offer. I'm not going to let you walk all over me.
I'm not afraid to take the lead, Bob. Meet me at this new number or we'll be walking away with nothing.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that
Are you kidding me, Bob? That's highway robbery! I'm not going to let you steal the majority of the money like this.
I'm not messing around, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. I'm not going to accept this
Are you kidding me, Bob? You're trying to steal the money from me? No way. I'm not accepting this insult.
This is it, Bob. Take the last 1% or walk away with nothing. The choice is yours.
I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this ridiculously unfair offer
No way, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept an offer that's so one-sided. It's time to split the difference.
